meanings.text: to slope or incline (something); to slant
(reflexive) to bank (to incline laterally in order to turn)

examples.first: ¡ Sí!- Digamos que amablemente se ladeará A unos # kilómetros
examples.second: Uh- huh!- ~ They sort of politely swing and sway ~ ~ ' Bout # miles ~ ~ Outside of Atlanta, G. A. ~ ~ They got doors that never had any lockin ' ~ ~ All they got they' re perfectly willing to share ~ ~ They can' t hear ol ' opportunity knockin ' ~ ~ While they' re rocking themselves to sleep ~ ~ In that old rocking chair ~ ~ They never worry ~ ~ They ain' t in a hurry ~ ~ Because they know they' re gonna stay ~ ~ ' Bout # miles ~ ~ Outside of Atlanta, G. A. ~ ~ Gonna leave my cares behind me ~ ~ You can always find me in Atlanta ~ ~ Atlanta ~ ~ Atlanta- lanta, G. A. ~ ~ G. A. ~ ~ G. A. ~

examples.first: Thomas es un adolescente cuadraplégico que, con gran esfuerzo, puede ladear la cabeza apenas unos milímetros, siendo éste el único movimiento que es capaz de hacer.
examples.second: Thomas, a quadriplegic adolescent, can laboriously move his head just millimetres from side to side. It is the only movement that he is able to make.

examples.first: Ader imitó las alas de los pájaros, que se pueden ladear para reestablecer el equilibrio o para inclinar el cuerpo en caso de un viraje.
examples.second: Bird’s wings were flexible and provided optimum control of the flying machine, and they could be inclined for banking during turns.

examples.first: Pero al poco rato se cansará ladeará la cabeza y se dormirá.
examples.second: But in a little while, you'll see, he'll get tired lay his head over and go to sleep.

examples.first: intenté ladear el paracaídas, pero no pude.
examples.second: I tried to side-slip the chute, but I couldn't.

examples.first: Sólo tenemos que ladear la almohada hacia la izquierda
examples.second: All we gotta do is lean the pillow up to the left

examples.first: Estaba un poco mojado, así que resbalaba y tuve que ladear varias veces, y me divertí.
examples.second: It was quite wet so it was slippery and I got a bit sideways a few times but it was good fun.
Ah, but how do you tilt the plane?

examples.first: ¿Debo ser compasiva, ladear la cabeza y decir " ¿qué tal? " en plan enfermera?
examples.second: Should I be compassionate, head tilted to the side,'how are you feeling? 'type of nurse?

examples.first: Sólo tenemos que ladear la almohada hacia la izquierda.
examples.second: All we gotta do is lean the pillow up to the left.

examples.first: Si piensa que le mientes, levantará una ceja y ladeará la cabeza.
examples.second: She thinks you're lying, she'll raise one eyebrow and cock her head.

examples.first: Ladear la aeronave, usar las alas como quilla.
examples.second: Solution: tilt the plane, use the wings as a keel.

examples.first: Te pusiste a ladear como un ternero, tuve que agarrarte a unos # metros
examples.second: He was loping off just after killing a calf.I winged him at # yards
